Package gil.core

Interface Summary
IProcedure  
IProcedure.IState  
ITransferPipeline  
 

Class Summary
AdapterValueObject Carrying data from a adapter object when there is a need of such data and you are prevented to supplying the original adapter object.
Command A object carrying the data neccessary to invoke a command.
CommandDescriptor Contains the specification of a command.
ExternalSystemProcedure This is the logic separated from the controlling thread to handle the communication with the external system.
IntegrationContext Class containing context data to be shared between the two threads hadling the communication with the external system and the process models.
IntegrationExecutive This class manages the data and command interchange between the process model and an external system.
LogfileMetadata  
ParameterDescriptor Contains the specification of a parameter to be part of a command specification.
ProcessModelProcedure This is the logic separated from the controlling thread to handle the communication with the process model.
SignalExchangeList This class handles parsing of Signal Exchange List files (SEL).
SignalMetadata Specifies a signal value.
SimState Defines constants for the common simulator states used in the process model adapter and the external system adapter.
SimTime A date time container.
SoftwareInfo  
StageValueObject  
Statistics Container for statistics data
SystemStatus  
TransferPipeline Representing a chain of stages where each stage can process data flowing through.
TransferPipelineBuilder The intent of this class is interpret xml data and construct a transfer pipeline dynamically from that xml data.
 

Enum Summary
SignalMetadata.DataflowDirection  
SignalMetadata.SignalDataType  
SignalMetadata.SignalType  
 

Exception Summary
IllegalConfigurationException Thrown when there is a error detected in a configuration file.
